name: Furret Walks Up An Escalator Until As Long As You Want
name_original: Furret Walks Up An Escalator Until As Long As You Want
description:
Press UP and LEFT to move the furret!

Press X to PET!!!

Features:

  • INFINITE gameplay, INFINITE furret!!
  • You can pet the furret (press X)
  • Beautiful procedurally drawn pokemon sprite!
  • Two frame walk cycle!
  • Wagging tail idlle animation!!
  • Real 3D escalators!!
  • Difficulty curve

Complete code: 557 bytes
